manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: release-name-external-secrets-cert-controller
  namespace: default
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: external-secrets-0.20.2
    app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets-cert-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.20.2
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets-cert-controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: external-secrets-0.20.2
        app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets-cert-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.20.2
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: external-secrets-cert-controller
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      hostNetwork: false
      containers:
      - name: cert-controller
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        image: oci.external-secrets.io/external-secrets/external-secrets:v0.20.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        args:
        - certcontroller
        - --crd-requeue-interval=5m
        - --service-name=release-name-external-secrets-webhook
        - --service-namespace=default
        - --secret-name=release-name-external-secrets-webhook
        - --secret-namespace=default
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        - --healthz-addr=:8081
        - --loglevel=info
        - --zap-time-encoding=epoch
        - --enable-partial-cache=true
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            port: 8081
            path: /readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: release-name-external-secrets-cert-controller
  namespace: default
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: external-secrets-0.20.2
    app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets-cert-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.20.2
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets-cert-controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: external-secrets-0.20.2
        app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets-cert-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.20.2
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: external-secrets-cert-controller
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      hostNetwork: false
      containers:
      - name: cert-controller
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        image: oci.external-secrets.io/external-secrets/external-secrets:v0.20.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        args:
        - certcontroller
        - --crd-requeue-interval=5m
        - --service-name=release-name-external-secrets-webhook
        - --service-namespace=default
        - --secret-name=release-name-external-secrets-webhook
        - --secret-namespace=default
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        - --healthz-addr=:8081
        - --loglevel=info
        - --zap-time-encoding=epoch
        - --enable-partial-cache=true
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            port: 8081
            path: /readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
